name: Disposition
description:
This is a global game jam 2022 duality themed game. You are in a space investigation about an experiment that went wrong at a certain space command center. And now you're trapped between two dimensions. Your mission is to kill the enemies and solve the puzzle to get out. This game was made by a group of indie artists and developers credits for the Global Game Jam 2022 

Artists

- Fatma Hussien 

- Youstina Masry 

- Shrouk Ayman 

- Maria Magdy 

Programmers 

- Omar Taha

 - Aly Barakat 

- Shahenda Wafa 

- Mohamed Arafa 

you can find our game here https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/...
